description: Professor Jax Thirio offers mock interviews to prep his students for the real world, but college senior Damien Kyle has no experience, no strengths, and no idea how to make a good first impression. Jax decides to try a different approach, bending the naughty Damien over his desk and spanking him with a ruler! Damien loves it, and shows the prof that there is one thing he excels at: sucking dick! Jax teaches Damien how to take it hard in his ass, and Damien wants to impress his professor by riding his cock and taking a huge load on his face.
title: More Spice Than Sugar
